channel.title: Adding Special Attack Effects - URGENT

item.title: Adding Special Attack Effects - URGENT
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey guys, I’ve got some great ideas, but I need to know how to do it… I was thinking that I would make one of my weapons heal 1/3 or your own HP when you use the special, I added this code, but of course no luck:

healing[1]=(playerXP[3]/3);And also, I don’t know any much of the math terms in java, and I wanted to make a special that would hit 25% higher to the originally calculatedMaxHit() or calculateSpecial().

I tried doing this in the calculateSpecial:

startAnimation(2890); specialDamage = 40 + misc.random(14) + CalculateMaxHit()*.25; specialAmount -= 50; }But it doesn’t work

Anyone know or can help me to any of these?

That’d be awesome.

Read full topic
